text: Reminder: INBOUND 2021 starts tomorrow. HubSpot Academy will have several sessions. While the content isn’t specifically focused on developers, it doesn’t hurt to learn about your colleagues roles as well as get a bigger picture view.  To see all the HubSpot Academy INBOUND content go to <https://www.inbound.com/2021-agenda> and click the ‘HubSpot Academy’ tag. If you’re attending INBOUND 2021 join fellow developers in <#C01BBPNJ25A|inbound-conference>.
